content: *if you have not tried felting this is a great first felt project lion brand yarn * lion brand pattern # 60179a skill level easy level 2 lion® wool article #820 2 colors 1 ball each crochet hook - size j-10 6 mm petal group make 2 bobble make 3 assemble and finish by felting see also 60228a felted foliage 1 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/felted-foliage
